code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NFTs=[{name:"StellarBloom Nexus",price:"1.2 ETH"},{name:"Chronosplicer",price:"800 BTC"},{name:"Singularity Helix",price:"950 MATIC"}];function NFTViewer(){const[filter,setFilter]=useState('');const filteredNFTs=NFTs.filter(nft=>nft.name.toLowerCase().includes(filter.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'2em'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83E\uDDFE NFT Vault"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Search NFT by name",value:filter,onChange:e=>setFilter(e.target.value),style:{marginBottom:'1rem',padding:'8px',width:'300px',fontSize:'14px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[filteredNFTs.map((nft,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{paddingBottom:'0.5rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:nft.name})," \u2014 ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:nft.price})]},idx)),filteredNFTs.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"No NFTs match your search."})]})]});}export default NFTViewer;
